title: Help needed
content: Guys I'm about to take admission in pes university rr campus... As you all know they have asked for demand drafts but when I went to bank they made manager's cheque and gave it to me and told that it's the same as a demand draft and it will work for admission process... Can anyone verify it please üôè

comments.body: No problem pal, we all need calming down sometimes. :)
Will work don't take tension? Btw what's your rank?

can we change our preferences during registration?

also will they not allow us to register if we dont have DDs?because my rank is 4k and i want to wait for 2nd round to get ECE.
I have no clue tbh... I think you should post this doubt and wait for a few seniors to reply
